document.full_text: the sailors finishing the fourth leg of a grueling, solo yacht race around the world arrived in charleston, south carolina, this week with sunburned faces and tales of trials on the open seas.
document.title: solo, around-the-world sailing race goes green
lines_and_colors: the sailors finishing the fourth leg of a grueling, solo yacht race around the world arrived in charleston, south carolina, this week with sunburned faces and tales of trials on the open seas.
